company.name: DEE DAVIS INC

introduction: DEE DAVIS INC is preparing a bid for a 1-year aggregate supply contract for a Michigan municipal client. We need competitive wholesale pricing for the materials listed below. This is a municipal government contract with potential for renewal.

scope_of_work.title: SCOPE OF WORK
scope_of_work.description: Selected supplier will provide aggregate materials on an as-needed basis throughout the contract period (1 year starting Spring 2026). Delivery required to Southeast Michigan location within 2 business days of order. Average order size: 50 tons or 200 cubic yards. Total estimated annual volume: 3,700 tons plus 1,000 cubic yards.
key_requirements: All pricing must be DELIVERED to Southeast Michigan location
Must meet MDOT specifications where noted
Delivery within 2 business days of order required
Quote must be valid through February 4, 2026
Confirm ability to meet MDOT specs for Items B and F

submission_requirements.title: SUBMISSION REQUIREMENTS
items: Complete pricing for all items listed
Product specifications and technical data sheets
References from at least 3 similar clients

items.title: Delivery
items.description: FOB Destination, freight prepaid and included

items.title: Contract Period
items.description: 1 year (starting Spring 2026) with option to extend

items.title: Quality Standards
items.description: All products must meet industry standards

items.title: Insurance
items.description: Vendor must maintain minimum $1M general liability
